item.title: Playground
item.description: The Go teams offers the go playground. This is a web code editor and compiler that allows to write and run go code. The Go Playground has several features that make it a useful tool: Easy to use: The Playground has a simple interface that makes it easy to write and test out code. Interactive: The Playground allows you to write code and see the results in real-time, making it a great tool for learning and experimenting with Go.
